org.apache.cassandra.utils.progress

Interface ProgressListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BootstrapMonitor, JMXNotificationProgressListener, JMXProgressSupport, LegacyJMXProgressSupport, RepairRunner

    public interface ProgressListener
    Listener interface to handle ProgressEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void progress(java.lang.String tag, ProgressEvent event)
      Called when some progress is made by progress publisher.

    • Method Detail

      • progress

        void progress(java.lang.String tag,
              ProgressEvent event)
        Called when some progress is made by progress publisher.
        Parameters:
        tag - String that identifies progress event.
        event - Current progress
